name: Trending Beasts
description:
Jetty's legend is going to be forgotten. As to keep it alive, this beast needs to appear in front of people and to become more popular.

BigBoot and Niessy weren't able to join the game due to the required extra efforts. Nevertheless, in case it's requested by people, there will be a new version after GameJam including them. Besides some game improvements that couldn't be implemented on time.

People will change into green color and spread the Jetty's knowledge to the people that is far away.

Don't let the popularity drops under 10% or the game will end. Keep going for 80 years or reach 90% of popularity.

I hope you enjoy the game, sorry for the English mistakes, thanks for playing and for your comments!

Don't forget to enable the sound, switched OFF by default.

Controls:
- Mouse: Left click - Show beast
- Move mouse to move beast horizontally

Implemented by:
Luis Miguel Rubio - @SiulerLM

Developed on: Game Maker Studio 2

Graphics done with:
- Procreate
- Pixel Studio
- Photofiltre

Music created on:
- BeepBox

Sound created on:
- Audacity

No beast was damaged during this game implementation, but the human that implemented it.

Dealgo Dev. Studio - @dealgoDevStudio
